content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's get down to business. How much are you willing to pay for such a prime location in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm very interested in your apartment, especially because of its central location and the fact that it's new and unfurnished. I'm looking for a place that I can make my own, and I believe this apartment has great potential. Regarding the price, I'm hoping to find a fair deal that aligns with the current market rates in the area. Would you be willing to start at a lower price point, considering that the apartment is unfurnished and I would need to invest in furniture?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I understand your interest in the apartment. However, as a landlord, I'm looking to get the best possible price for my property. The fact that it's unfurnished is not a disadvantage, as many tenants prefer to furnish the place themselves. So, I'm not willing to lower the price based on that. What's your maximum budget for rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your perspective on the unfurnished aspect. I understand that landlords often aim for the best price. As for my budget, I'm willing to pay up to 800 Euros per month for the right apartment. I believe that for a newly built, central location such as this, a price around this range would be fair and competitive. Would you be open to considering this offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your offer of 800 Euros per month is quite low considering the prime location and the quality of the apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a premium for this kind of property. If you're serious about renting this apartment, I would expect an offer closer to 1000 Euros per month. Would you be willing to reconsider your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your position and understand that you're seeking a premium price for your apartment. However, as a student, my budget is limited, and 1000 Euros per month is unfortunately out of my reach. I'm looking for a fair compromise that reflects the value of the apartment while also being within my financial capabilities. Is there any wiggle room in your asking price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, as a student, I'm sure you're aware of the high demand for quality housing in the city center. While I appreciate your situation, I must insist on a price that reflects the market value of the apartment. The cost of construction and the prime location justify a higher rent. If you're unable to meet my asking price, I'm sorry, but I'll have to consider other potential tenants who are willing to pay the premium.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm aware of the demand for city center apartments, and I understand that you're looking to maximize your return. However, as a student, I have a limited budget, and I must be mindful of my financial situation. If you're not open to negotiating the price, I may need to reconsider my options. I'm still interested in the apartment, but I need a price that aligns with my budget. Is there any possibility of reaching a middle ground?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I'm sorry to hear that you're unable to meet my asking price. As a landlord, I have a responsibility to my investors to achieve the best possible return on their investment. If you're unable to pay a premium for this apartment, I recommend you look for other options that better fit your budget. I wish you the best of luck in your search.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time and effort in showing me the apartment. While I'm disappointed that we couldn't reach an agreement on the price, I respect your position as a landlord. I will certainly keep looking for an apartment that better suits my budget. Thank you again for your time. "TERMINATE"
name: Haoyu Wang from China
